author: Juhani Suhonen
comment: I have moto360 and Nexus6 but faces with weather are not updating :(
title: Not updating weather :(

author: Lionel Maury
comment: Love being updated when new faces are available.
title: Excellent

author: Dervi Hernandez
comment: You guys have the best watch faces on the play store keep it up.
title: The Best (Moto360)

author: Joshua campbell
comment: So, I know it sucks to have to pay for faces, but a dollar per face really isn't that bad. I mean if you download a face just to realize you don't like it, just refund it. ALSO, you can change up the brightness, colors, °C/°F etc without the trouble of editing a bunch of crap.   Easy to navigate through since it's all categorized from moto360, LG G-R, and Square face watches,  etc.
title: IMO, This is the best watch face app

author: Lowell Gilbert
comment: Love it, perfect for Moto360. Have one complaint temperature is always 10 to15 degrees lower than actual
title: Great

author: Andrew Harley
comment: Loads of info, bright colourful futuristic looking ... feel like im living in the "minority report" and work fine with only 2 crashes in 2 weeks and thats just for a few seconds and the its up and running again ... I check the store for new faces every few hours too! Keep em coming!
title: Best looking and most functional on G WATCH R

author: Patrick
comment: Constantly crashes play store.  No support from developer.  Uninstalling as it is to annoying.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please send us more information about crash, I'd like to fix it.
Thank you for your cooperation.

title: Crashes

author: Erie T
comment: This app gives easy access to this dev's watchfaces.  Please update all your watchfaces to support "Small Notification Cards" from Android Wear 5.0.1 update. Thank you!
title: The best

author: A Google User
comment: I like this app. It's a one stop shop for all of this dev's watchfaces and now FINALLY you can open installed apps from within.
title: Finally got that big fixed

author: Kris Hook
comment: 3D style like 'Holo clock face' for Samsung Gear S should be next in here for Moto360!
title: Cool

author: James Cole
comment: I love most of your faces, I'd like to see consistent options across the board though. The big missing one for me right now is the "Enable Drawing for Ambient-Mode" setting on the A06 face (my favorite face).  Ability to change the background LCD color like on the other faces (like A45) would be great too (I'd like it a lot on A41).  Thanks!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
There are several watchfaces for Moto 360 having an option for the solution of the problem you mentioned.

Please try looking for the option named ’Enable Drawing for Ambient-Mode' in settings.
A41/F01/F02/F03 already have, and feel free to contact us for another face's status by emailing.
Thank you.

title: A little more feature cross-consistency would be nice

author: Brian Feckter
comment: Great looking faces, super quick response from developer when i had a question, keep it up
title: Great faces

author: nickolas giagkos
comment: Are not showing up on the smartwatch, thus the one star!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
About which face?
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thanks.

title: The faces provided for LG G watch R
